text.firstperson.title: FirstPerson Settings
text.firstperson.tab.autovanillahands.to: Automatically switches to vanilla hands when holding items
text.firstperson.tab.disableitems.toolti: Disables FirstPerson mod while holding the specified items
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.xOff: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.snea: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth while sneaking
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.enab: The default state of the FirstPerson mod after starting the game
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.sitX: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth while sitting
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.rend: Shows arrows, bee stings or other modded features in first person
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.vani: Shows the vanilla first person hands
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.dyna: Changes the Vanilla Hands view based on the current view
modmenu.summaryTranslation.firstperson: Enables the third-person Model in first-person
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.firstpers: Enables the third-person Model in first-person
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.vani: Disables the Vanilla Hands while swimming(also ignoring the dynamic mode)
